html:
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.contract_terms}}

By executing below or by electronic signature, the parties agree to accept the terms of this "{{doc.name}}"

{{doc.signed_by_company or ''}}, {{frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.signed_by_company, "designation") or ''}}, {{frappe.db.get_value("Employee", doc.signed_by_company, "company") or ''}}

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.creation, "dd MMMM, YYYY") }}

{% if(doc.is_signed) %}
{% if(doc.party_type != 'Employee') %}

{{doc.signee}}, {{doc.party_name}}

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.signed_on, "dd MMMM, YYYY") }}

{% else %}

{{doc.signee}}

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.signed_on, "dd MMMM, YYYY") }}

{% endif %}
{% endif %}
name: Bloomstack Contract
